info.title: QR code generator with multiple datatypes .
info.description: QR code generator with text,url,tel,sms and email datatypes .

get.description: This API will return you an URL of the QR Code image that you can easily embed on to website or download it for your other needs.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Select one of the QR code formats to generate. url,text,telno,mailto,smsto

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Enter value as per your QR code type. Eg: url=https://www.google.com,text=Some text,telno=9142545474,smsto=8542487542
